section.name: Hacking the core
section.span: Take a deep dive into core Hippo CMS development.
section.p: Hippo CMS is open source software. All source code is available from our SVN repository under the Apache license. This section explains how to get the source code, how to build it, and how to set up your IDE. In addition, the architecture and the conceptual ideas behind it are explained in detail.

ul.li: Project structure - Find your way in the project directory structure.
Building from source - Learn how to build from source on the command line, and how to use different IDEs.
Fundamentals - Read about the fundamental ideas behind the code.
Architecture - Get an in-depth explanation of the system architecture.
